summary: A specialized diffusion pipeline that generates images from text prompts, extending the standard Stable Diffusion workflow with Kohya high‑resolution fixing. It orchestrates a VAE, CLIP text encoder, tokenizer, UNet denoiser, scheduler, and safety checker, while offering built‑in support for loading LoRA weights, textual inversion embeddings, IP adapters, and checkpoint files.
business_intent: Enable developers and artists to produce higher‑quality, high‑resolution text‑to‑image outputs with reduced artifacts, while providing safety filtering and flexible model‑component loading for customized diffusion workflows.
